rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A small foyer that leads into the living areas. The design includes a Vastu-compliant main entrance facing east for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area with Mediterranean style decor and natural lighting, featuring built-in seating areas. Vastu guidelines suggest it be centrally located.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for family meals, designed with an open kitchen concept that allows easy flow, while ensuring privacy when needed.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional and compact space designed with modern appliances. Vastu principles suggest that the kitchen should be in the south-eastern part of the ground floor for good energy flow.

rooms.name: Wardrobe/Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared family bathroom with integrated wardrobe closet. Vastu guidelines recommend placing water-related features in the south-eastern part of the house; this room is positioned accordingly.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated room with soundproofing and dim lighting, designed to create an immersive movie-watching experience. Located in a quieter area of the house per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A cozy nook with ample shelving and natural lighting. The library is designed to be serene for reading, adhering to Vastu guidelines of placing knowledge rooms in the north-east.

openings.description: Large arched door facing east as per Vastu norms to invite positive energy.
Large windows are installed in the living room, library and home theater for natural light while ensuring proper ventilation.
Separates the dining area from the kitchen, offering an open but functional layout.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a private balcony and a small en-suite bathroom. Vastu guidelines suggest master bedrooms face north for prosperity.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed to be quiet and conducive to rest, placed on the east side as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom for family members or guests. Designed with a compact layout but ample storage, following Vastu principles of balanced energy.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1
rooms.description: En-suite bathroom for the master bedroom providing privacy and modern fixtures.

rooms.name: Balcony/Outdoor Space
rooms.description: A small open terrace adjoining the bedrooms with Mediterranean-style seating area, offering fresh air and light.

openings.description: Provides access to the outdoor space from each bedroom.
Large windows in bedrooms and balcony for ventilation and natural lighting.
